I was a rookie in my office last year.

sentences.en: P > He was just a rookie trooper and he surely shook with fright.

sentences.en: Plus, it is the most home runs by any Dodger rookie.
sentences.cn: 此外, 这也是道奇队新人单季最多全垒打纪录.

sentences.en: Rookie Is this all there is to it? I can handle this!

sentences.en: The crowd went crazy over the razzle - dazzle play by the rookie guard.

sentences.en: The rookie complained that the coach kept him mostly on the bench.

sentences.en: Thursday marks a big day for undrafted rookie Coby Karl.

sentences.en: Verdict: He will make team and play very little as a rookie.

sentences.en: Williams, the rookie, is really out for the gold.
